page.description: Fill a blob with replicated data from another blob.
page.original:
.REPLICATE() Syntax .REPLICATE( Blob_Data as B, Count as N ) ArgumentDescription Blob_DataA blob variable with data that you wish to write into . CountThe number of times to write Blob_Data.
Description The .REPLICATE() method initializes and writes Blob_Data Count times. Example dim b1 as B dim b2 as B b2 = char_to_blob("d") b1.replicate(b2, 4) ? b1 = dddd
See Also Blob Functions and Methods
